reportSkippedTitle.description: Tells the user it cannot report a whitelisted domain.

reportSkippedMessage.message: Du har skrudd av utvidinga på denne nettstaden. Ver vennleg og skru ho på igjen og sjå om du sjår infokapselåtvaringa, før du meldar ifrå om ho.
reportSkippedMessage.description: Tells the user it cannot report a whitelisted domain.

reportConfirm.message: Vil du melde ifrå om ei infokapselåtvaring på $HOSTNAME$?
reportConfirm.description: Ask for confirmation before reporting a website. Don't use quotes here.

menuIdle.message: Utvidinga verkar ikkje på denne nettstaden
menuIdle.description: Menu option visible when enabling/disabling doesn't work.

optionsWhitelist.message: Liste over alle kvitelistade nettstader, ei nettstad kvar linje:

reportGithub.description: Menu item to report using Github

generalIssueOption.description: The option text for a general issue

scrollbarIssueOption.description: The option text for a scrollbar issue

modalIssueOption.description: The option text for a modal issue

scrollbarIssueDescription.message: Select this option to signify an issue on this page related to scrolling - like 'the site is not showing a scrollbar'.
scrollbarIssueDescription.description: Explanation of what a scrollbar issue is

modalIssueDescription.message: Select this option to signify an issue on this page related to a modal - like 'there is a pop-up box blocking interaction'.
